page.title: 05CHURCHES AND RELIGION
page.content: In Borehamwood there are various churches of differing denominations. These include Church of England, Roman Catholic, Congregational and Presbyterian, Baptist and Evangelical. There are more{Church of England places of worship than for any other denomination. In addition there are some Jewish believers and a{Synagogue}has been established for this community. More people in Borehamwood go to {Free Churches}than any other kind of church. However not many people attend church in this town. In fact, one particular C of E church has only one service each Sunday instead of two. They also have some financial problems since the church costs Â£1,500 per week to run. The new church roof cost Â£19,000. Vandals are also a problem. They break the stained glass windows.
